name: Ugh!
description:
From the maker of six #1 ranked games on iPhones and iPads!
____________________________________________________

Aliens have arrived. They are destroying everything. A caveman stands in their way. The brave Ugh!

Ugh! has already seized an alien weapon.

Help Ugh!
-Battle intergalactic enemies
-Unleash vaporizers
-Use weapons and defenses
-Warp to new worlds

Fast-paced, thrilling, action, running game. In stereo audio. With fantastic graphics.

Ugh! the cave man is completely free and you can play all the way though without spending anything. If you choose, you can buy in-game items to accelerate your progress.
